name: Bouncing Poro
description:
• Version: 0.4.1
  • This game was originally undergraduate work..

For fans of League of legends. From fan of League of legends.

Yes, this is the Poro. From the Frel′jord.

He is trapped and will most likely die. So press space bar and try to pull away this time!

Got tired of waiting for the start of the game? Got tired of waiting for the long loading? Kill time with Bouncing Poro!

Versions for Linux and Mac OS X will come later.

If you find a bug please let me know.

If you have any cool ideas for this game, then I'm willing to consider each of them.

Version 0.4.1

  • Code refactoring
  • Removed dynamic difficulty adjustment
  • Removed difficulty
  • Removed unused menu items
  • A small redesign of the menu pages
  • Support for 32-bit systems
